definitions: in a way that includes or deals with all or nearly all elements or aspects of something

examples.text: these books are precisely and comprehensively illustrated

shortDefinitions: in way that includes or deals with all or nearly all elements or aspects of something

definitions: in a very clear or convincing manner

examples.text: the public has comprehensively rejected the technology

shortDefinitions: in very clear or convincing manner

definitions: (in relation to insurance) in a way that provides cover for most risks

examples.text: she crashed her comprehensively insured vehicle

shortDefinitions: in way that provides cover for most risks
